briefTitle: Medical Radiometer - RTM - 01 - RES and Its Use in Detecting Hotspots in Female Breast
officialTitle: Early Detection of Breast Disease Using Medical Radiometer - RTM - 01 - RES
primaryOutcomeMeasure: Testing the sensitivity of the Microwave Thermography RTM-01-RES (ability to detect hotspots in breast lesions)
eligibilityCriteria:
Inclusion Criteria:

* The perfect sample should be 2000 females or more.
* 50 % already diagnosed breast cancer of any type
* 30% normal thought to be healthy females.
* 10% lactating
* 10% different breast diseases

Exclusion Criteria:

* Menstruating females.
